name: Tennessee田纳西
lyric:
tennessee
(edited by ajiadang)

tennessee
you shine on me
eazy come
hard to leave
i should die
but never cry
used to be
a magic knight
dream some dreams
not say sorry
paint my heart
let it be lush
hold me tight
that's alright
anyway
you're my sea
*dance with who at night
fire around,river's gone
velvet face prides you
but now you've got only me left

tennessee
you shine on me
eazy come
hard to leave
i should die
but never cry
used to be
a magic knight
dream some dreams
not say sorry
paint my heart
let it be lush
hold me tight
that's alright
anyway
you're my fairy
*who's stolen your watch
would like to continue
the feeling that made you dizzy
now it's all becomin' empty

comments.brief: 第一次听GALA的英文歌的时候就大叹 哇这英语这么难听还敢唱出来 后来听多了才发现事首值得单曲循环的歌儿~
#毕业#
田纳西

Hold me tight. That's all right. Anyway, you're my sea.
这哭腔真适合今天晚上
GALA这张专辑里最著名的应该是那首欢乐的chinglish歌曲young for you。这首更上口一点，让我们一起卷起舌头唱，Tennessee, you shine on me, easy come, hard to leave
TENESSEE CHA CHA
如果感到悲伤我会陪你晒太阳~~~
忧伤的田纳西
此田纳西非彼有名的田纳西华尔兹 虽无落在岁月厚厚的灰尘里 但却是一道希望的光线  真诚里自有感动
